Posts.Content: Jan 9, 2013 04:35PM sangeetasahni wrote: Hi, I am sure your mum will do better and as you told she is a fighter. i am writing on behalf of my mom.. she is dx with stage4 cancer this nov 14th. and since then she underwent two surgeries and first chemo is done on 26th of dec.  my mum too is afighter.. as she is perparing dishes of our choice in between when ever she can. as other tols. hope and attitude of family members is also a key to patients fight.  Hang on please and keep updating., this will give strength to all of us on the boat.
Posts.Title: Mom stage IV, Gemzar didn't work, please give hope!! gapeach524 ibcmets
